posts.post_title: Looking for a higher grade red cobb
posts.post_content: Would prefer a 2-5 range. Please pm or email if you have one at [url]pianni89@gmail.com[/url] thanks!

[quote name="sportscardpete" post=2026477]Would prefer a 2-5 range. Please pm or email if you have one at [url]pianni89@gmail.com[/url] thanks![/QUOTE]
